metadata.Title: CVE-2021-39211 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: GLPI is a free Asset and IT management software package. Starting in version 9.2 and prior to version 9.5.6, the telemetry endpoint discloses GLPI and server information. This issue is fixed in version 9.5.6. As a workaround, remove the file `ajax/telemetry.php`, which is not needed for usual functions of GLPI.

criterions.comment: glpi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
